participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, Alex often prefers solitude but has a passion for gaming and streaming.
participant_1.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on a building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Sociable and friendly, Jordan enjoys sharing stories and connecting with people from different walks of life.
participant_2.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i met taylor swift. i'm a convenience store manager. i've short brown hair. my favourite music is country music.

content.text: you know what? i met taylor swift
